attributes.additional_details: Reduce fuel tax by at least 15%..inline with other countries that ARE supporting there people
attributes.background: Spain.france and other countries have reduced fuel tax by 20 to 15% yet this government could not be bothered to even turn up at the last hearing.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you'd like a cut to fuel duty or to all fuel taxes (duty and VAT).  We're also not sure what you're referring to when you say "this government could not be bothered to even turn up at the last hearing"

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
